item.title: How I trained my Rangoli Art(GAN)
item.description: Materials I used : Data-set comprising of rangoli images ( ~13k) StyleGan2 - Tensorflow A little patience Google Colab (Tesla P100 ~24gb ram) Firstly I thouht of using pre-made data-sets, but decided to build one. Making a data-set is painful process but rewarding. I used instagram and search engine scrappers to download rangoli images. Found many on web, really thankful to the Indian tradition and people. real images
